portfolio.description: Minimalist web platform created to help Starcraft 2 players find other similar minded players to tackle the game challenges together. Developed in an API + Client architecture using Laravel 5.1, AngularJS 1.3 and Socket.IO, with fully covered BDD tests written in Frisby.js. Deployed on Linode / Ubuntu.
